mapper.update: update logistics_deliveryplace set mgID = #{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePName = #{depname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceName = #{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityName = #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mgName = #{mgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePTel = #{deptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePaddr = #{depaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dePID = #{depid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dePID, mgID, dePName, provinceName, cityName, mgName, dePTel, dePaddr, COMMENT from logistics_deliveryplace
